tool_description: Configures motion detection parameters including sensitivity, detection zones, and trigger thresholds for cameras.

camera_id.description: Camera identifier to configure motion detection for

sensitivity.description: Motion sensitivity level from 1 (least) to 10 (most sensitive)

detection_zones.description: Areas to monitor (full_frame, left_half, right_half, center, custom)

minimum_object_size.description: Minimum object size percentage to trigger detection (1-50)

trigger_delay.description: Seconds of motion required before triggering (1-30)

error_messages: Camera not found: The specified camera_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid sensitivity: Use integers 1-10 where 1 is least sensitive and 10 is most sensitive.
Invalid detection zone: Use predefined zones or 'custom' with proper coordinates.
Object size out of range: Minimum object size must be 1-50 percent of frame.
Invalid trigger delay: Use 1-30 seconds for motion trigger delay.
usage: Configure motion detection by specifying camera_id and sensitivity. Optionally define detection zones, object size thresholds, and trigger delays.

configuration_status.description: Success or error status of motion detection setup

estimated_triggers_per_day.description: Estimated number of motion triggers per day
